data.title: Dr. Linda Hughes of North Broward Radiologists Discusses Latest Interventional Radiology Advancements
data.meta_description: Anita Finley, Publisher of Boomer Times & Senior Life, recently interviewed North Broward Radiologists’ Dr. Linda Hughes on WSBR 740AM. […]
data.text:
Anita Finley, Publisher of Boomer Times & Senior Life, recently interviewed North Broward Radiologists’ Dr. Linda Hughes on WSBR 740AM.

In her interview, Dr. Hughes shared information about her impressive career as a Vascular and Interventional Radiologist. She explained what motivated her to become an Interventional Radiologist, what the future holds in her field, and the unique patients and procedures that have especially impacted her.

Dr. Hughes shared many insights into what types of non-invasive procedures patients can undergo outside of the hospital. The technological advances in the Interventional Radiology field will save patients time and cost with faster recovery times.

The fascinating interview with Dr. Hughes is now available online for free. Click here to listen and learn:

Dr. Hughes joined North Broward Radiologists in 2008, is the only female radiologist that provides Uterine Fibroid Embolization (UFE) in Broward County. She has extensive knowledge on the latest technology in medicine, and is an expert in areas like UFE, endovascular repair of thoracic and abdominal aortic aneurysms, angioplasty, stent placement, and more.

You can also read more about Dr. Hughes by visiting her bio online.

A special thank you to Anita Finley, Boomer Times & Senior Life, and WSBR 740AM for permission to provide access to this very special and insightful interview.
